info.title: Open Analytics API
info.description: Self-hosted GA4 Analytics Dashboard API. Access property data including overview stats, top pages, traffic sources, devices, geography, events, and AI-generated insights. All data is cached for 15-30 minutes.

get.description: Returns all GA4 accounts and their associated properties accessible by the configured service account. Cached for 30 minutes.
Returns all analytics data for a property in one request: overview, top pages, traffic sources, devices, geography, events, and insights.

Returns current & previous period totals, percentage deltas, and daily chart data. Metrics: sessions, activeUsers, newUsers, screenPageViews, engagementRate, bounceRate, averageSessionDuration, sessionsPerUser.

200.description: Overview with current, previous, delta, and chart data

get.description: Returns pages ranked by pageviews with path, title, view count, average session duration (seconds), and bounce rate.
Returns sessions and new users grouped by source/medium. Common sources: google/organic, direct/(none), facebook/referral.
Returns sessions grouped by device category: desktop, mobile, tablet.
Returns sessions grouped by country, sorted by count descending.
Returns event names with total counts, sorted descending. Common GA4 events: page_view, session_start, first_visit, scroll, click.
Returns all pages grouped by page title with views, active users, views per user, engagement duration, and event count. Also includes a daily time-series chart for the top 10 pages.

200.description: Detailed pages report with chart data

chart.description: Daily pageview time series for top 10 pages

get.description: Returns up to 3 insight banners with severity (warning, success, opportunity, info) based on analytics data. Covers traffic drops, growth, source diversity, mobile optimization.

text.example: Sessions dropped 25% compared to the previous period. Investigate traffic sources for changes.

bearerAuth.description: Use your ANALYTICS_PASSWORD as the bearer token.

apiKeyAuth.description: Pass your ANALYTICS_PASSWORD as X-Api-Key header.
apiKeyAuth.name: X-Api-Key
